meanings.definition: Most good or excellent in quality or character.
meanings.sent1: The goodliest cake at the party was delicious.
meanings.sent2: She wore the goodliest dress to the event.
meanings.sent3: The goodliest puppy in the litter was also the most mischievous.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the goodliest ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The goodliest sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.

meanings.definition: Most pleasing or attractive in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The goodliest flower in the garden bloomed brightly.
meanings.sent2: The princess wore the goodliest crown at the ball.
meanings.sent3: The goodliest painting in the gallery caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the goodliest melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The goodliest mountain peak stood majestically against the sky.

meanings.definition: Most suitable or effective for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The goodliest tool for the job was the hammer.
meanings.sent2: The goodliest strategy for success was careful planning.
meanings.sent3: The goodliest joke at the party had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was the goodliest guidance he had ever received.
meanings.sent5: The goodliest path through the forest was well-marked and clear.
